email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are currently exploring options for shipping 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this route? Ideally, we are looking for a laycan starting from November 20.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, which is currently available and suitable for your cargo. The initial freight quote is USD 22.50 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The laycan can be adjusted to November 20-25.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 22.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 21.00 per metric tonne? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and any potential laytime allowances?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market, we can adjust the rate to USD 21.50 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata, with a laytime allowance of 72 hours for loading and 96 hours for discharging.

Let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the rate of USD 21.50 per metric tonne, provided the laycan remains November 20-25. Please confirm the final details and send over the recap.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Great! The deal is confirmed. Please find the recap attached.

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarão
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN HORIZON
Freight: USD 21.50/MT
Laycan: 20-25 Nov 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata

Thank you for your business!

Best regards,
Emily
